data.title: A Main Spawn Barrier Spy Cam
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Spy Cam that allows you to safely spot and tag enemy players peeking out of A Main toward the start of the round, while also leaving a Spy Cam that can be used to watch the flank.

data.title: Aggressive B Main Spawn Barrier Spy Cam
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Spy Cam that allows you to safely spot and tag enemy players peeking out of B Main toward the start of the round, while also leaving a Spy Cam that can be used to watch the flank.
